Hi - We looked into this. The best option is to go to city centre and explore some cafes there. It is ~45 minute drive one way. You can go to the Karaköy area for some famous eateries and lounges near Galata Bridge for a great view. Some popular spots for this:
1. Loi Bosphorus: Very well rated restaurant with traditional Turkish cuisine and a great view.
2. Kapı Karaköy: Known for its kebabs and  ⁠mezes;
3. ⁠ Karaköy Güllüoğlu: Famous for its Baklava and Turkish tea. Does not serve hookah though

If you have the time (>6 hours) and energy, you can also go for the city tour. Turkish Airlines offers a free city tour for their passengers with a long layover. You can also visit the Haga Sophia if the layover is at night.

The annual maintenance fee for all is:
- *Jupiter*: Rs.300 annual fee if annual spends are less than 25k. Waived if you upgrade to higher tiers for >=6 months.
- *⁠Fi Money*: No account maintenance charge. Rs.299 annual fee on their standard debit card. Rs.199 annual fee on their Plus debit card if annual spends are less than 25k.
- *⁠Niyo*: No annual fee but Rs.200 for every transaction made at a global ATM. 

All of them support 0 balance accounts.

quoted_content.body:
Hi Rahul, the marriage certificate application is fully filled and e-signed by everyone. The last step is to upload the document and submit.

While we have all other documents, we are still stuck at your age proof document, as the only acceptable documents are these:
- Birth certificate
- School marksheet or certificate (10th or 12th)
- Doctor Certificate

As you don't have #1 & #2, the only option here is to obtain a doctor's certificate as proof of address. We have talked to an agent, and they have recommended a hospital to get it done. You will have to visit with your Aadhar and request the doctor to issue a certificate with their letterhead mentioning your age as per Aadhar, and they will do it after taking some money.

Bowring and Lady Curzon Hospital (https://g.co/kgs/viYL43D)

We are trying to connect with the hospital over the phone to get more information, but haven't been lucky yet.

There is an online option too, but we'll need to log in to the Karnataka Seva Sindhu portal using your DigiLocker account to apply for this.

quoted_content.body:
Hey, there is this website which helps you get a view of the stadium from all seats: https://aviewfrommyseat.com/venue/SoFi+Stadium/seating-chart/concert/

This is the link for the SoFi Stadium. This is a subjective call based on how big a fan of the artist you are and what matters to you in a concert. For example, I personally am okay not seeing the artist via direct eye contact and seeing them on the big screen. I think sections 300 and 400 seem to be good value for money. If you have specific date preferences, I can make specific seat and money recommendations to you.

I'd also recommend waiting for a few weeks, as it is likely that the prices are going to go down. Given that there are 4 shows and many people are selling already, there's a good chance that the market will sell below the original price. However, if you're a big fan and can't take the risk, you should consider buying this week.

Lineup (Saturday, July 12)
The full Saturday roster includes:

THE LOST STAGE (Main Stage)
- 4:00–4:55 PM – Juuku
- 5:00–5:55 PM – Crystal Skies
- 5:55–6:55 PM – Tsu Nami
- 6:55–7:55 PM – MitiS
- 7:55–8:55 PM – San Holo (DJ Set)
- 8:55–9:55 PM – Alan Walker
- 10:00–11:00 PM – SLANDER (Originals Only)

Ticket Info Recap
- July 12 – Lost In Dreams (Day Pass)
- General Admission: ₹ 8000 -12,888 (~ US$91.78 - $150.70)
- VIP: ₹12,260 - 17,534 (~ US$143.06 - $250) [ SOLD OUT ]
- Venue: LA State Historic Park
1245 N Spring St, Los Angeles, CA 90012

Extra Info
- It’s an 18+ event, with parking available (including SpotHero) 
- The festival runs from 4:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Yes, Alan Walker is scheduled to perform at 8:55 PM, following San Holo. He is the second-to-last act of the evening.

- Event details of 12th July: https://links.faffit.com/3YRZp8
- Booking link: https://links.faffit.com/TyYZFH

Hi,
A.R. Rahman will be performing in Los Angeles this summer as part of The Wonderment Tour.

This information has been compiled through detailed research from reputable sources, including Ticketmaster, AXS, Sulekha Events, viagogo, and the official websites of the venue and event organizers.

A.R. Rahman – The Wonderment Tour
- Venue: Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), 1111 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA
- Date & Time: Saturday, July 26, 2025 at 7:30 PM 
- Tickets on sale: US$79- $386+ ( ₹6,771.63 - 33,086.70) - based on seats.
- Details Link: https://links.faffit.com/nLsLBB
- Booking Link: https://links.faffit.com/T27zzz

This marks one of 16 North American tour stops, featuring a full-scale orchestral production with A.R. Rahman’s top hits and iconic film scores

If you require any further assistance regarding show details or booking, please feel free to reach out to us. We are here to help.

Hey! We checked with the previous vendor we had spoken to for the tuxedo, but unfortunately, they don’t have any women’s collection. 
We’ve now reached out to two other women’s rental stores and shared with them all the references, including the Pinterest ones, which you had shared. 
Our contact has passed on all the details to the store representative, and we’re currently waiting for them to get back to us. The stores open around 9 a.m., so we’re expecting to hear back after that. As soon as they respond with availability or any options, we’ll update you right away.

Hey! We contacted La Lapita,
Website: http://lalapita.com
Google Maps: https://g.co/kgs/Kba2Z4V 
They’re open Monday to Saturday, from 9 AM to 6 PM, with the last appointment slot at 5:30 PM (excluding holidays). 
They mentioned it’s best to book an appointment in advance, as they’re not always open. We’ll go ahead and schedule one. Just let us know when you’d like us to book it.

They sell and rent elegant women’s dresses in sizes ranging from XS to 4XL.
They had a few questions for scheduling:
- When would you like to schedule your appointment?
- What’s your schedule like?
- What blouse size are you?
- What’s the date of your event?

Just a note: they don’t carry midi or bridal dresses, but they do have stylish wedding guest outfits similar to the one you had shared with us earlier. Once you let us know your preferences, we’ll send you some dress options they have.

Hey! We just got an update from La Lapita. They mentioned that they can speak English and would prefer to directly connect with the person who wants to rent the dress, which would make the process easier for them.

You can reach them on WhatsApp at +57 311 544 7358. You can share all your sizes, references, and the type of product you're looking for; they’ll assist you directly.

Let us know if we can help you with anything else!
